page.title: 17THE HOUSES OF BARROW
page.content: We found in a sample of 258 houses that 80% were owner occupied of the sample 13% are private tenant and 7% are council tenant. The oldest house is the Bishop Beveridge House it was built in the 13th century. The Mock Tudor house at 4a Beveridge Street was built in the 1600's. Within the last 25 years there have been some estates built in Barrow. They are known as The Beaumont estate, The Lakes and The Rivers. The Mount is probably the biggest house in Barrow. As well as The Mount, Barrow Cliffe house and Stratcliffe House are both big houses. We found that 7% of houses had 2 bedrooms, 76% had 3 bedrooms, 15% had 4 bedrooms and 2% had 5 bedrooms. {CLAIRE ALDERSON {ZOE LINDSAY {LARAINE MILES
